get.description: Retrieves users information based on certain criteria.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of users.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of users per page.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the request body.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The content types the client is willing to accept.

status.description: Indicates whether the request was successful.

active.description: Indicates whether the page is active.

total.description: The total number of items per page. Defaults to 15.

per_page.description: The total number of items available per page. Defaults to 15, with a minimum of 10 and a maximum of 25.

next_page_url.description: The URL of the next page. Can be null if there is no next page.

prev_page_url.description: The URL of the previous page. Can be null if there is no previous page.

first_page_url.description: The URL of the first page.

from.description: The starting index of the data on the current page. Minimum value is 1.

last_page.description: The last page number. Minimum value is 3.

last_page_url.description: The URL of the last page.

path.description: The path of the current page.

to.description: The ending index of the data on the current page. Example value is 2. Can be null.
